name: Indian Ocean: Live
description:
Bengaluru, mark your calendars — August 23rd, 7 PM onwards.

Indian Ocean live at Hamilton Cocktail Bar, Whitefield.

Brace yourself for a soul-stirring night as Indian Ocean, India’s iconic folk-rock powerhouse, takes the stage at Hamilton for an unforgettable live performance.
From Kandisa to Bandeh, experience the sound that defined a generation — raw, powerful, and deeply rooted in the Indian spirit.
Pair the performance with our signature cocktails and electric vibe.

name: Make Origami Boxes
description:
Join us for a hands-on introduction to the art of origami boxes. In this beginner-friendly workshop, we’ll explore the fundamentals of paper folding and create functional boxes of various shapes and sizes. We’ll explore basic folding techniques and learn how to create boxes that can hold small objects, gifts, or just sit beautifully on your desk.
All materials will be provided. Feel free to bring your own patterned/ colored papers/ used gift wrapping papers / paper bags to make the boxes.

name: Learn to Make Origami Boxes
description:
In this beginner-friendly workshop, we’ll explore the fundamentals of paper folding and create functional boxes of various shapes and sizes. We’ll explore basic folding techniques and learn how to create boxes that can hold small objects, gifts, or just sit beautifully on your desk.

All materials will be provided. Feel free to bring your own patterned/ colored papers/ used gift wrapping papers / paper bags to make the boxes.

General Rules :
- Ages 10 and above
- All materials will be provided
- Contact 9513222681 for more details.

name: Sis X Tenzee Hyrox Bootcamp- Women Only
description:
Unleash the Athlete in You!
Join us for an electrifying Hyrox Bootcamp at Tenzee Multisports, where endurance meets strength in the ultimate fitness challenge. Whether you're preparing for your next Hyrox event or just looking to level up your functional fitness, this bootcamp is designed to push your limits and transform your performance.
Expect a high-energy mix of:
Functional strength training
Cardio intervals
Mobility drills
Race-style circuits modeled on real Hyrox events

Open to all fitness levels, this bootcamp is perfect for athletes, CrossFitters, weekend warriors, and anyone ready to test their grit in a community-driven environment. 
Contact: Vaishnavi - 6380349608

name: DOGA - Yoga With Your Furry Friends(Women Only)
description:
DOG +YOGA = DOGA!
Whether you're a paw-rent or just a dog lover, this one's for you!
Join us for a paws-itively calming yoga session where you can flow with your furry friend — or simply soak in the good vibes solo.
10th August
11:30 AM – 12:30 PM
DizzyDuck Studio, Koramangala
Refreshments included post-session!
No dog? No problem. Just come and unwind with like-minded humans and happy tails!

name: Folk & Tonic Home Concert
description: Folk & Tonic returns with their beloved home concert series this August, promising an enchanting evening of folk music and rich harmonies from around the globe. Attendees will be immersed in a cozy and intimate setting, where the power of vocal music comes to life. The concert invites guests to connect with the melodies and harmonies in an atmosphere that's both warm and inviting. Limited seating enhances the exclusivity of the experience, encouraging early RSVP for those eager to partake in this unique musical gathering.

name: Complex Challenges of Carbohydrates
description: Bread for breakfast, roti for lunch, and rice for dinner. These carbohydrate-rich meals no longer complement many of our sedentary lifestyles. Join Artists Priya Mani and Vinay Venkataraman as they explore their exhibit Carbivore, which examines our relationship with carbohydrates and what it means to our society. Explore how carbs are more than just calories—they shape tradition, impact the environment, and also deeply influence our health. The talk will explain the basis of the installation, the process and behind-the-scenes snippets of the interactive art piece.

name: Swara Siri
description: Swara Siri is an evening featuring the mesmerizing sounds of Hindustani Classical Music, presented by Smt. Reshma Bhat. She will showcase her profound musicality while being accompanied by the rhythmical prowess of Dr. Udayraj Karpur on the Tabla and the melodic notes of Tejas Katoti on the Harmonium. This exquisite event is graced by the presence of notable dignitaries, Shri S. Murugan, ADGP of Karnataka, and Shri Ganapathi S Hegde, President of Cobalt, promising an evening rich with cultural reverence and musical excellence.

location.name: Cobalt forum of art & music, Rajarajeshwari Nagar, Bengaluru
location.address: Cobalt forum of art & music, Rajarajeshwari Nagar, Bengaluru, Bangalore

name: A Rock Climbing Experience
description: In this exhilarating adventure, participants will engage in a rock climbing session, guided by trainers. It's an opportunity to challenge oneself physically while enjoying breathtaking views from new heights.

name: Author Talk w/ Harini Nagendra
description: Meet bestselling author Harini Nagendra, discussing her latest novel, Into the Leopard’s Den, part of the Bangalore Detectives Club series. Hear stories behind the stories, and get your copy signed. The event focuses on the book's themes, characters, and the author's creative process. It's a chance to connect with a celebrated Indian author and fellow book lovers.
